skills.description: Attack the closest target and deal 518% P.DMG.

Attack the closest target and deal 291% P.DMG, target's DEF -330, last 3 sec.
Attack the farthest target and deal 236% M.DMG. Extra DMG based on the distance, plus an extra DMG up to 1181% M.DMG.
Attack the farthest target and deal 202% M.DMG. Extra DMG based on the distance, plus an extra DMG up to 101% M.DMG.
Attack all targets within a radius of 8 to the front and deal 249% P.DMG, reduce healing amount by 252%
